channel.title: Get vReportBoard mod for SMF
channel.description:
I've used the "report to moderator" feature a couple of times, but nothing ever happens. My solution is to get the vReportBoard mod from the SMF website. This mod allows you to choose a board to store all of the reports. You could then make the board so only moderators and admins could access it.
This would be a good idea for the site, so that all of the moderators and admins could see the reported posts, and they could respond very quickly to the reported posts.

item.title: Get vReportBoard mod for SMF
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

Eh? When did the report button not work?

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:33017”]Star, it takes about 30 seconds to search.

Also, while you’re at it, install a warning mod I could use it.[/quote]
Owned him lol.

Read full topic
